entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023
